Comment 3: 
When filing an issue, the first thing you are asked to do is:

"Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks."

Did you do that? This may be particularly important in your case because it will include
revision bc5f123ece35.

net: default to 127.0.0.1, not localhost, in TestICMP

If localhost resolves to ::1, the IPv4-only test fails.

http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?spec=svn334b588b4e4fa5bdbfe7bb1644e2ef86fbe87472&r=bc5f123ece35cdc156531b741d4eccff16a5e8d1
